UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Truncated antimicrobial peptides from marine organisms retain anticancer activity and antibacterial activity against multidrug-resistant Staphylococcus aureus.
Literature.Author: Lin MC, Hui CF, Chen JY, Wu JL

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Vibrio alginolyticus(no activity data),Vibrio harveyi BCRC 13812(no activity data),Vibrio vulnificus 204(no activity data),Micrococcus luteus BCRC 11034(MIC=100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus BCRC 10780(MIC=100µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae BCRC 10794(MIC=100µg/ml),Streptococcus agalactiae(no activity data),Staphylococcus sp. BCRC 10451(MIC=12.5µg/ml)
